name: In the Snow
description:
Pay what you want! (That means free!)

This game was created in about a day based off of "Rain, House, Eternity" by the great Kitty Horrorshow!

Controls:

WASD to move + mouse to move

It's a pretty short experience, but basically play (which SHOULD be self-explanatory) till the game starts screaming at you. When you're there, go find your spaceship, you're ready to go home.
